General.Name: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Poly Acrylic Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes acrylic and acrylonitrile butadiene styrene, high impact polystyrene (HIPS), and other extruded plastic sheets in Thailand and internationally. It provides range of cast acrylic sheets, which includes general purpose, texture, diffusion, light guide panel, magic colors, LED block, micarle-1, and sanitary ware. The company offers extrusion sheet/rolls including ABS, HIPS, polypropylene and polyethylene sheets, PS pattern, PMMA anti-glare and pattern under the Complas, Moden Plas, Moden Glass, SuperGlas XT, and Impact XT brands. In addition, it servers architecture and construction, automotive and transportation, home appliance and fridge, interior design and decoration, lighting, packaging, retail display and POP, sanitary ware, signage and advertisement, trophies and premium applications. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Sam Phran, Thailand.
General.Address: 60-61 Moo 9, Putthamonthon Sai 4 Road, Sam Phran, Thailand, 73220
